import numpy as np
def heuristics_v2(el: tuple[int, ...], n: int, w: int) -> float:
    # Penalty for the number of elements in the set
    penalty = len(el) / n
    
    # Penalty for the sum of the elements in the set
    penalty += sum(el) / w
    
    # Penalty for the distance of the element
    dist = sum(abs(el[i] - xi) for i, xi in enumerate(el))
    
    penalty += dist / (n * w)
    
    return -penalty
